message: A fair starting point, Bob. Let's wrap this up quickly!
Let's split it evenly, Alice. We both get a fair share this way.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob, but time is running out - and the value with it!
Alice, I'm willing to give you a bit more than last time, but I need to ensure I get a fair share too. Time is ticking, let's reach an agreement!
This is my final offer, Bob. We're both losing out the longer this goes on.
Alice, we're both losing money with every passing round. Let's be reasonable and split the money closer to 60/40 in my favor. It's a better deal for both of us than letting everything go to waste.
Bob, we're running out of time. This offer is a compromise that still gives you something. Don't let everything disappear!
Alice, we're at the point where we're both losing a lot of money. This is my final offer. If we don't agree, we'll both get nothing.
Bob, this is it. Take this offer or we both walk away with nothing. Don't be greedy.
